items.sentence: I know you want to act all macho and everything, but now's not the time for that.
There are a lot of gullible people, so there is a chance that Tom will be elected.
Tom\'s parents sent him to Boston because he kept getting into trouble in Chicago.
We learned how to read French in school, but didn\'t really learn how to speak it.
Tom didn\'t need to paint the fence. They tore it down a week after he painted it.
